channel.title: Can i use global variable or login id in Query parameters?
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Hi,
Can I use userid in query?
I want to show different results for each user.
I know I can create a separate Data Sources, but I'm looking for a simpler way.
Thanks.
![image|690x342](upload://ojfHNAZWtiyzncKIoONHbEyt8yt.png)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: Version: 8.0.0+b32245 * Browser/OS: Chrome/ win10 64 * How did you install Redash: Following Docker Based developer installation guide.

item.title: Can i use global variable or login id in Query parameters?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Welcome to the forum!

No, this isn’t supported. But it would be a cool feature.

An alternative way we could implement it is user credential passthrough, so you wouldn’t even need conditional statements in your SQL.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i use global variable or login id in Query parameters?
